data.title: Shamari DeVoe - Age, Family, Bio
data.meta_description: Shamari DeVoe: her birthday, what she did before fame, her family life, fun trivia facts, popularity rankings, and more.
data.text:
About

R&B singer and actress known for being a member of the group Blaque. Their 1999 debut album reached the Top 25 of the R&B charts and was certified platinum. She became a cast member on the reality series The Real Housewives of Atlanta.

Before Fame

She started performing early in her life and formed her own group, called Intrique, while in high school. She later left the group to join Blaque.

Trivia

Her acting credits include the show VIP and the movies Honey and Bring It On.

Family Life

She married Ronnie DeVoe, of Bell Biv DeVoe, in 2006. The couple welcomed twin boys Ronald and Roman in 2017.

Associated With
